trans-unit.source: The camera is not available to use (there may be no camera hardware)
trans-unit.target: 摄像机无法使用(可能没有摄像机硬件)。

trans-unit.source: The camera is not recording video.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机没有录制视频。

trans-unit.source: The camera is on the back face of the system hardware. For example on a mobile device, it means it is on the opposite side to that of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 摄像头在系统硬件的背面。例如在移动设备上,它意味着它在屏幕的反面。

trans-unit.source: The camera is on the back face of the system hardware. For example, on a mobile device, it is on side opposite from the screen.

The camera is on the front face of the system hardware. For example on a mobile device, it means it is on the same side as that of the screen. Viewfinder frames of front-facing cameras are mirrored horizontally, so the users can see themselves as looking into a mirror. Captured images or videos are not mirrored.
trans-unit.target: 摄像头在系统硬件的正面。例如在移动设备上,它意味着它与屏幕的同一面。前置摄像头的取景框是水平镜面的,所以用户可以看到自己是在照镜子。捕捉到的图像或视频不会被镜像。

trans-unit.source: The camera is on the front face of the system hardware. For example, on a mobile device, it means it is on the same side as the screen. Viewfinder frames of front-facing cameras are mirrored horizontally, so the users can see themselves as looking into a mirror. Captured images or videos are not mirrored.
The camera is recording video.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机正在录制视频。

trans-unit.source: The camera is starting as a result of state transition to Camera.ActiveState. The camera service is not ready to capture yet.
trans-unit.target: 由于状态转换为Camera.ActiveState,摄像机正在启动。摄像机服务尚未准备好捕捉。

trans-unit.source: The camera is starting in result of state transition to QCamera::ActiveState. The camera service is not ready to capture yet.
trans-unit.target: 相机由于状态转换到QCamera :: ActiveState而启动。相机服务尚未准备好捕获。

trans-unit.source: The camera is stopping as a result of state transition from Camera.ActiveState to Camera.LoadedState or Camera.UnloadedState.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机从Camera.ActiveState到Camera.LoadedState或Camera.UnloadedState的状态转换而停止。

trans-unit.source: The camera is stopping in result of state transition from QCamera::ActiveState to QCamera::LoadedState or QCamera::UnloadedState.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机由于从QCamera :: ActiveState到QCamera :: LoadedState或QCamera :: UnloadedState的状态转换而停止。

trans-unit.source: The camera is transitioning from Camera.ActiveState to Camera.LoadedState or Camera.UnloadedState.
The camera is transitioning from Camera.LoadedState or Camera.ActiveState to Camera.UnloadedState.
The camera is transitioning from Camera.UnloadedState to Camera.LoadedState or Camera.ActiveState.
The camera is transitioning to Camera.ActiveState. The camera service is not ready to capture yet.
The camera is trying to automatically focus
trans-unit.target: 相机正试图自动对焦

trans-unit.source: The camera must be loaded before calling this function, otherwise the returned list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此函数之前必须加载摄像机,否则返回的列表为空。

trans-unit.source: The camera or camera backend is not available.
trans-unit.target: 摄像机或照相机后台不可用。

trans-unit.source: The cap height of a font is the height of a capital letter above the baseline. It specifically is the height of capital letters that are flat - such as H or I - as opposed to round letters such as O, or pointed letters like A, both of which may display overshoot.
trans-unit.target: 字体的上限高度是指大写字母高于基线的高度。具体来说,它是指扁平的大写字母的高度--如H或I--与圆形字母(如O)或尖头字母(如A)相反,这两种字母都可能出现过冲。

trans-unit.source: The cast to QLabel, on the other hand, fails. The pointer is then set to 0. This makes it possible to handle objects of different types differently at run-time, based on the type:
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，对QLabel的强制转换失败。然后将指针设置为0。这使得可以根据类型在运行时以不同方式处理不同类型的对象：

trans-unit.source: The cast to MyWidget is successful because qobject_cast() makes no distinction between built-in Qt types and custom types.

trans-unit.source: The categories of a manager engine are relatively static entities; for engines accessing remote place datastores it may be desirable to cache the category structure rather than querying a server every time QPlaceManagerEngine::initializeCategories() is called. Depending on how dynamic the categories are, always downloading the freshest set of categories may be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 管理器引擎的类别是相对静态的实体；对于访问远程位置数据存储区的引擎，可能希望在每次调用QPlaceManagerEngine :: initializeCategories（）时都缓存类别结构，而不是查询服务器。根据类别的动态程度，始终下载最新的类别集可能更合适。

trans-unit.source: The categories of an axis.
trans-unit.target: 轴的类别。

trans-unit.target: 目前正在删除该类别,在当前操作完成之前,不能进行其他操作。

trans-unit.target: 该类别对当前用户来说是私有的。该类别可以转移到在线服务中,但只对当前用户可见。

trans-unit.source: The category only has a pointer tool by default, and we have to add the Qt objects we want to use in our form. Right-click on the empty space, and select "Customize". This opens a dialog that has two tabs, "COM Components" and ".NET Framework Components". We used ActiveQt to wrap QWidgets into COM objects, so we select the "COM Components" page, and look for the classes we want to use, e.g. "QPushButton" and "QAxWidget2".

The category only has a pointer tool by default, and we have to add the Qt objects we want to use in our form. Right-click on the empty space, and select "Customize". This opens a dialog that has two tabs, "COM Components" and ".NET Framework Components". We used ActiveQt to wrap QWidgets into COM objects, so we select the "COM Components" page, and look for the classes we want to use, e.g. "QPushButton" and "QAxWidget2".
trans-unit.target: 该类别默认情况下仅具有一个指针工具，并且我们必须在表单中添加要使用的Qt对象。右键单击空白区域，然后选择“自定义”。这将打开一个包含两个选项卡的对话框，“ COM组件”和“ .NET Framework组件”。我们使用ActiveQt将QWidget包装到COM对象中，因此我们选择“ COM Components”页面，并查找我们要使用的类，例如“ QPushButton ”和“ QAxWidget2”。

trans-unit.source: The central property of an accessible objects is what role() it has. Different objects can have the same role, e.g. both the "Add line" element in a scroll bar and the OK button in a dialog have the same role, "button". The role implies what kind of interaction the user can perform with the user interface element.
trans-unit.target: 可访问对象的中心属性是它具有的作用（）。不同的对象可以具有相同的角色，例如，滚动条中的“添加行”元素和对话框中的“ OK 按钮都具有相同的角色“按钮”。该角色表示用户可以与用户界面元素进行哪种类型的交互。

trans-unit.source: The certificate can be rejected by calling rejectCertificate, which will stop loading the web engine request. By default, an invalid certificate will be automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用rejectCertificate拒绝证书，这将停止加载Web引擎请求。默认情况下，无效的证书将被自动拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The certificate claimed DNS names that are in violation of name constraints.
trans-unit.target: 该证书声称的DNS名称违反了名称约束。

trans-unit.source: The certificate contains a weak key.
trans-unit.target: 该证书包含一个弱密钥。

trans-unit.source: The certificate contains errors.
trans-unit.target: 该证书包含错误。

trans-unit.source: The certificate did not match the built-in public keys pinned for the host name.
trans-unit.target: 证书不符合主机名的内置公钥钉。

trans-unit.source: The certificate error can be handled by using the methods of the WebEngineCertificateError type.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用WebEngineCertificateError类型的方法来处理证书错误。

trans-unit.source: The certificate error can be ignored by calling ignoreCertificateError, which will resume loading the request.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用ignoreCertificateError忽略证书错误，该错误将继续加载请求。

trans-unit.source: The certificate error is ignored, and the web engine view continues to load the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: 证书错误被忽略,网络引擎视图继续加载请求的URL。

trans-unit.source: The certificate has a validity period that is too long. (Added in 5.7)
trans-unit.target: 证书的有效期过长。(在5.7中添加)

trans-unit.source: The certificate has a validity period that is too long. (Added in Qt 5.7)
trans-unit.target: 证书的有效期过长。(在Qt 5.7中添加)

trans-unit.source: The certificate has been revoked.
trans-unit.target: 该证书已被撤销。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 证书无效。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is known to be used for interception by an entity other the device owner. (Added in 5.15)

The certificate is not revoked, but this does not necessarily mean that the certificate was ever issued or that the time at which the response was produced is within the certificate's validity interval.
trans-unit.target: 证书没有被撤销,但这并不意味着证书曾经被签发过,也不意味着产生响应的时间是在证书的有效期内。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not signed by a trusted authority.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not valid at the current date and time.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is signed using a weak signature algorithm.

trans-unit.target: 对等体在握手过程中出示的证书,以及通往CA证书的链条。

The characteristic contains the angle on the horizontal plane between the direction of the (Geographic) True North and the Magnetic North, measured clockwise from True North to Magnetic North.

trans-unit.source: The characteristic exposes the apparent wind direction. The apparent wind is experienced by an observer in motion. This characteristic states the direction of the wind with an angle measured clockwise relative to the observers heading.
trans-unit.target: 该特性暴露了表观风向。观察者在运动中感受到的是表观风向。该特性表示风向,相对于观测者的方向,以顺时针方向的角度测量。

trans-unit.source: The characteristic states the direction of the wind with an angle measured clockwise relative to (Geographic) True North. A wind coming from the east is given as 90 degrees.

trans-unit.source: The characteristic states the wind speed in meters per seconds.
trans-unit.target: 该特性以米/秒为单位说明风速。

trans-unit.source: The characteristic value may be written via the QLowEnergyService instance that manages the service to which this characteristic belongs. trans-unit.source: The class allows both NDEF data and/or files to be shared between two devices by calling the setShareModes() method. This method specifies either an NDEF Data and/or a File transfer. The targetDetected() signal is emitted each time a share target is detected. A QNearFieldShareTarget pointer is passed with the signal, which can be used to share either an NDEF message or one or more files.

trans-unit.source: The class allows to access HTTP cookies of Chromium for a specific profile. It can be used to synchronize cookies of Chromium and the QNetworkAccessManager, as well as to set, delete, and intercept cookies during navigation. Because cookie operations are asynchronous, the user can choose to provide a callback function to get notified about the success of the operation. The signal handlers for removal and addition should not be used to execute heavy tasks, because they might block the IO thread in case of a blocking connection.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许访问特定配置文件的Chromium的HTTP cookie。它可用于同步Chromium和QNetworkAccessManager的 cookie，以及在导航期间设置，删除和拦截cookie。因为cookie操作是异步的，所以用户可以选择提供回调函数来获取有关操作成功的通知。用于删除和添加的信号处理程序不应用于执行繁重的任务，因为在连接阻塞的情况下它们可能会阻塞IO线程。

trans-unit.source: The class allows to store client certificates in an in-memory store. trans-unit.source: The class is used as a helper to marshall types in QVariant and in queued signals and slots connections. It associates a type name to a type so that it can be created and destructed dynamically at run-time. Declare new types with Q_DECLARE_METATYPE() to make them available to QVariant and other template-based functions. Call qRegisterMetaType() to make types available to non-template based functions, such as the queued signal and slot connections.
trans-unit.target: 该类用作在QVariant中以及在排队的信号和插槽连接中编组类型的助手。它将类型名称与类型相关联，以便可以在运行时动态创建和销毁它。使用Q_DECLARE_METATYPE（）声明新类型，以使它们可用于QVariant和其他基于模板的函数。调用qRegisterMetaType（）使类型可用于非基于模板的功能，例如排队的信号和插槽连接。

trans-unit.source: The class is used to send arguments over D-Bus to remote applications and to receive them back. D-Bus offers an extensible type system, based on a few primitive types and associations of them. See the Qt D-Bus Type System page for more information on the type system.

trans-unit.source: The class primarily provides an optimization for cases where the text, its font and the transformations on the painter are static over several paint events. If the text or its layout is changed for every iteration, QPainter::drawText() is the more efficient alternative, since the static text's layout would have to be recalculated to take the new state into consideration.

trans-unit.target: 该类提供有关生成qDebug（），qInfo（），qWarning（），qCritical（）或qFatal（）消息的源代码位置的信息。

The class supports the mapping of particular strings or integers with particular objects using setMapping(). trans-unit.source: The class supports the mapping of particular strings, integers, objects and widgets with particular objects using setMapping(). The objects' signals can then be connected to the map() slot which will emit a signal (it could be mappedInt(), mappedString(), mappedWidget() and mappedObject()) with a value associated with the original signalling object. Mappings can be removed later using removeMappings().

trans-unit.source: The classes below provide support for secure network communication using the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol, using the OpenSSL Toolkit to perform encryption and protocol handling.
The classes below provide support for secure network communication using the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol, using the OpenSSL Toolkit to perform encryption and protocol handling.
trans-unit.target: 下面的类提供对使用安全套接字层（SSL）协议的安全网络通信的支持，并使用OpenSSL Toolkit执行加密和协议处理。

trans-unit.source: The classes listed below automatically detach from common data if an object is about to be changed. The programmer will not even notice that the objects are shared. Thus you should treat separate instances of them as separate objects. They will always behave as separate objects but with the added benefit of sharing data whenever possible. For this reason, you can pass instances of these classes as arguments to functions by value without concern for the copying overhead.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象即将被改变,下面列出的类会自动从公共数据中分离出来。程序员甚至不会注意到这些对象是共享的。因此,你应该把它们的单独实例当作单独的对象。它们将始终表现为单独的对象,但有一个额外的好处,即尽可能共享数据。出于这个原因,你可以通过值将这些类的实例作为参数传递给函数,而不必担心复制的开销。

trans-unit.source: The classification functions include functions like those in the standard C++ header <cctype> (formerly <ctype.h>), but operating on the full range of Unicode characters, not just for the ASCII range. They all return true if the character is a certain type of character; otherwise they return false. These classification functions are isNull() (returns true if the character is '\0'), isPrint() (true if the character is any sort of printable character, including whitespace), isPunct() (any sort of punctation), isMark() (Unicode Mark), isLetter() (a letter), isNumber() (any sort of numeric character, not just 0-9), isLetterOrNumber(), and isDigit() (decimal digits). All of these are wrappers around category() which return the Unicode-defined category of each character. Some of these also calculate the derived properties (for example isSpace() returns true if the character is of category Separator_* or an exceptional code point from Other_Control category).
trans-unit.target: 分类功能包括与标准C ++头文件<cctype>（以前为<ctype.h>）中的功能相同的功能，但这些功能可在整个Unicode字符范围内运行，而不仅限于ASCII范围。如果字符是某种类型的字符，它们都将返回true；否则，它们都将返回true。否则，它们返回false。这些分类函数是isNull（）（如果字符为'\ 0'，则返回 true ），isPrint（）（如果字符是任何类型的可打印字符（包括空格），则为true），isPunct（）（任何类型的标点符号），isMark（）（Unicode标记），isLetter（）（一个字母），isNumber（）（任何数字字符，而不仅仅是0-9），isLetterOrNumber（）和isDigit（）（十进制数字）。所有这些都是类别（）的包装，它们返回每个字符的Unicode定义类别。其中一些还计算派生的属性（例如，如果字符属于Separator_ *类别或Other_Control类别中的特殊代码点，则isSpace（）返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: The colors are specified as a set of ColorGradientStop child items, each of which defines a position on the gradient from 0.0 to 1.0 and a color. The position of each ColorGradientStop is defined by setting its position property; its color is defined using its color property.
trans-unit.target: 颜色被指定为一组ColorGradientStop子项，每个子项都定义了从0.0到1.0的渐变上的位置以及一种颜色。每个ColorGradientStop的位置是通过设置其position属性来定义的；其颜色是使用其color属性定义的。

trans-unit.source: The colors are specified as a set of GradientStop child items, each of which defines a position on the gradient from 0.0 to 1.0 and a color. The position of each GradientStop is defined by setting its position property; its color is defined using its color property.
trans-unit.target: 颜色被指定为一组GradientStop子项，每个子项定义了渐变上从0.0到1.0的位置以及一种颜色。每个GradientStop的位置是通过设置其position属性来定义的；其颜色是使用其color属性定义的。

trans-unit.source: The colors in a gradient are defined using stop points of the QGradientStop type; i.e., a position and a color. Use the setColorAt() function to define a single stop point. Alternatively, use the setStops() function to define several stop points in one go. Note that the latter function
trans-unit.target: 渐变中的颜色是使用QGradientStop类型的停止点定义的；即位置和颜色。使用setColorAt（）函数定义单个停止点。或者，使用setStops（）函数一次性定义多个停止点。注意后一个功能

trans-unit.source: The colors in a gradient is defined using stop points of the QGradientStop type, i.e. a position and a color. Use the QGradient::setColorAt() or the QGradient::setStops() function to define the stop points. It is the gradient's complete set of stop points that describes how the gradient area should be filled. If no stop points have been specified, a gradient of black at 0 to white at 1 is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用QGradientStop类型的停止点（即位置和颜色）定义渐变中的颜色。使用QGradient :: setColorAt（）或QGradient :: setStops（）函数来定义停止点。渐变的完整停止点集描述了如何填充渐变区域。如果未指定任何停止点，则使用0处黑色到1处白色的渐变。

trans-unit.source: The colors in an image's color table are specified as ARGB quadruplets (QRgb). Use the qAlpha(), qRed(), qGreen(), and qBlue() functions to get the color value components.
trans-unit.target: 图像颜色表中的颜色指定为ARGB四倍体（QRgb）。使用qAlpha（），qRed（），qGreen（）和qBlue（）函数来获取颜色值分量。

trans-unit.source: The colors in the gradient() all have an alpha component that is 255.
trans-unit.target: 渐变（）中的颜色都有一个255的alpha分量。

trans-unit.source: The column categories of the mapping. Only items with column role values that are found in this list are included when the data is resolved. The columns are ordered in the same order as they are in this list.

trans-unit.source: The combo box takes ownership of the line edit.
trans-unit.target: 组合框对行编辑的所有权。

trans-unit.source: The combobox is populated with an alphabetized list of font family names, such as Arial, Helvetica, and Times New Roman. Family names are displayed using the actual font when possible. For fonts such as Symbol, where the name is not representable in the font itself, a sample of the font is displayed next to the family name.
trans-unit.target: 组合框中填充了按字母顺序排列的字体族名列表,如Arial、Helvetica和Times New Roman。在可能的情况下,会使用实际的字体来显示家族名称。对于诸如Symbol这样的字体,如果字体本身无法显示其名称,则会在族名旁边显示字体样本。

trans-unit.source: The combobox will adjust to minimumContentsLength plus space for an icon. For performance reasons use this policy on large models.
trans-unit.target: 组合框将调整为minimumContentsLength加上图标的空间。出于性能原因，请在大型模型上使用此策略。

trans-unit.source: The combobox will adjust to its contents the first time it is shown.
trans-unit.target: 组合框第一次显示时,会根据其内容进行调整。

trans-unit.source: The combobox will always adjust to the contents
trans-unit.target: 组合框将始终根据内容进行调整。

trans-unit.source: The command accepts a single argument specifying the table's width as a percentage of the page width:
trans-unit.target: 该命令只接受一个参数,指定表格的宽度为页面宽度的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The command also follows the same conventions for argument as the \printline command, and it is used in conjunction with the \quotefromfile command.

trans-unit.source: The command can have either one or two arguments. The first argument is always a file name. The contents of the file must be QDoc input, in other words, a sequence of QDoc commands and text, but without the enclosing QDoc comment /*! ... */ delimiters. If you want to include the entire named file, don't use the second argument. If you want to include only part of the file, see the two argument form below. Here is an example of the one argument form:

trans-unit.source: The command is intended for use when quoting parts from file with the walkthrough commands: \printline, \printto, \printuntil, \skipline, \skipto, \skipuntil. This enables you to quote specific portions of a file.

The command is used in conjunction with the \quotefromfile command, and should be stated on its own line. The dots are rendered on a new line, using a monospace font.

The command is useful when some snippet of commands or text is to be used in multiple places in the documentation. Use the \include command wherever you want to insert a snippet into the documentation. The file containing the snippet to include must be located under the path(s) listed in the sourcedirs QDoc configuration variable. It can be either any source file parsed by QDoc (or even the same one where \include command is used), or any other text file. To store snippets in a separate file that is not meant to be parsed by QDoc, use a file extension that is not listed in sources.fileextensions; for example, .qdocinc.
trans-unit.target: 当在文档中的多个位置使用一些命令或文本片段时，该命令很有用。要将\ snippet插入文档的任何地方，请使用\ include命令。包含要包含的代码段的文件必须位于sourcedirs QDoc配置变量中列出的路径下。它可以是QDoc解析的任何源文件（甚至可以是使用\ include命令的源文件），也可以是任何其他文本文件。要将代码片段存储在QDoc不会解析的单独文件中，请使用sources.fileextensions中未列出的文件扩展名。例如 .qdocinc 。

trans-unit.source: The command is useful when some snippet of commands or text is to be used in multiple places in the documentation. Use the \include command wherever you want to insert a snippet into the documentation. The file containing the snippet to include, must be located under the path(s) listed in the sourcedirs or exampledirs QDoc configuration variable. It can be either any source file parsed by QDoc (or even the same one where \include command is used), or any other text file. To store snippets in a separate file that is not meant to be parsed by QDoc, use a file extension that is not listed in sources.fileextensions; for example, .qdocinc.

trans-unit.source: The command line tools provided by the Android SDK Tools package also enables updating the SDK, but without a GUI. For example, the following command on Ubuntu updates the SDK by installing the latest build-tools, platform-tools, emulator, and patcher packages:

trans-unit.source: The command link is a new control that was introduced by Windows Vista. Its intended use is similar to that of a radio button in that it is used to choose between a set of mutually exclusive options. Command link buttons should not be used by themselves but rather as an alternative to radio buttons in Wizards and dialogs and makes pressing the "next" button redundant. The appearance is generally similar to that of a flat pushbutton, but it allows for a descriptive text in addition to the normal button text. By default it will also carry an arrow icon, indicating that pressing the control will open another window or page.
trans-unit.target: 命令链接是Windows Vista引入的一个新控件。它的用途类似于单选按钮,用于在一组相互排斥的选项之间进行选择。命令链接按钮不应该单独使用,而是作为向导和对话框中单选按钮的替代品,并使按 "下一个 "按钮成为多余。其外观一般与扁平按钮相似,但它除了正常的按钮文字外,还允许有描述性的文字。默认情况下,它还会带有一个箭头图标,表示按下该控件将打开另一个窗口或页面。

trans-unit.source: The command must stand on its own line. See Qt Sensors QML Types for an example. The page is generated from qtsensors5.qdoc. There you will find a qdoc comment containing the \qmlmodule command for the QtSensors module. The same qdoc comment contains two \annotated-list commands to list the QML types in two separate groups. The QML types have been divided into these two groups because it makes more sense to list them this way than it does to list them in a single alphabetical list. At the bottom of the comment, \noautolist has been used to tell qdoc not to generate the automatic annotated list.
trans-unit.target: 该命令必须独立运行。有关示例，请参见Qt传感器QML类型。该页面是从 qtsensors5.qdoc 生成的。在那里，您将找到一个包含QtSensors模块 \qmlmodule 命令的qdoc​​注释。相同的qdoc​​注释包含两个 \annotated-list 命令，以在两个单独的组中列出QML类型。 QML类型已分为两组，因为以这种方式列出它们比在单个字母列表中列出更有意义。在注释的底部，已使用 \noautolist 告诉qdoc不要生成自动注释列表。

The QML types have been divided into these two groups because it makes more sense to list them this way than it does to list them in a single alphabetical list. trans-unit.source: The compass returns the azimuth of the device as degrees from magnetic north in a clockwise direction based on the top of the device, as defined by QScreen::nativeOrientation. There is also a value to indicate the calibration status of the device. If the device is not calibrated the azimuth may not be accurate.
trans-unit.target: 指南针根据设备的顶部（如QScreen :: nativeOrientation所定义），以顺时针方向从磁北向返回设备的方位角。还有一个值指示设备的校准状态。如果设备未校准，则方位角可能不准确。

trans-unit.source: The component instance scope hierarchy extends to out-of-line components, too. In the following example, the TitlePage.qml component creates two TitleText instances. Even though the TitleText type is in a separate file, it still has access to the title property when it is used from within the TitlePage. QML is a dynamically scoped language - depending on where it is used, the title property may resolve differently.
trans-unit.target: 组件实例范围层次结构也扩展到离线组件。在下面的示例中， TitlePage.qml 组件创建两个 TitleText 实例。即使 TitleText 类型在单独的文件中，当从 TitlePage 中使用它时，它仍然可以访问 title 属性。QML是一种动态范围的语言-根据其使用位置， title 属性的解析方式可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameters influence how often a master and a slave device synchronize with each other. How these criteria should be weighed against each other is highly dependent on the concrete use case.

trans-unit.source: The console-oriented platform plugins like eglfs and linuxfb install signal handlers by default to capture interrupt (SIGINT), suspend and continue (SIGTSTP, SIGCONT) and termination (SIGTERM). This way the keyboard, terminal cursor, and possibly other graphics state can be restored when the application terminates or gets suspended due to kill, or Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Z. (although terminating or suspending via the keyboard is only possible when QT_QPA_ENABLE_TERMINAL_KEYBOARD is set, as outlined above in the Input section). However, in some cases capturing SIGINT can be undesirable as it may conflict with remote debugging for instance. Therefore, the environment variable QT_QPA_NO_SIGNAL_HANDLER is provided to opt out from all built-in signal handling.
trans-unit.target: 面向控制台的平台插件（例如eglfs和linuxfb）默认情况下会安装信号处理程序，以捕获中断（ SIGINT ），挂起并继续（ SIGTSTP ， SIGCONT ）和终止（ SIGTERM ）。这样，当应用程序由于 kill 或 Ctrl+C 或 Ctrl+Z 而终止或被挂起时，可以恢复键盘，终端光标以及可能的其他图形状态。 （尽管仅在设置了 QT_QPA_ENABLE_TERMINAL_KEYBOARD 时，才可以通过键盘终止或挂起，如上面“输入”部分所述）。但是，在某些情况下，捕获 SIGINT 可能是不可取的，因为它可能与例如远程调试冲突。因此，提供了环境变量 QT_QPA_NO_SIGNAL_HANDLER 以选择退出所有内置信号处理。

trans-unit.source: The container classes are implicitly shared, they are reentrant, and they are optimized for speed, low memory consumption, and minimal inline code expansion, resulting in smaller executables. In addition, they are thread-safe in situations where they are used as read-only containers by all threads used to access them.

The container classes are implicitly shared, they are reentrant, and they are optimized for speed, low memory consumption, and minimal inline code expansion, resulting in smaller executables. In addition, they are thread-safe in situations where they are used as read-only containers by all threads used to access them.
trans-unit.target: 容器类是隐式共享的，它们是可重入的，并且已针对速度，低内存消耗和最小的内联代码扩展进行了优化，从而生成了较小的可执行文件。此外，在所有用于访问它们的线程都将它们用作只读容器的情况下，它们是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: The container itself is not copied before iterating over it.
trans-unit.target: 容器本身在迭代之前不会被复制。

trans-unit.source: The content context is used by backends to store additional content context related to the content request. Other relevant fields should also be filled in. For example, if the content request is for image content the content type should also be set with setContentType(). The content context allows additional context to be kept which is not directly accessible via the Qt Location API.
trans-unit.target: 后端使用内容上下文来存储与内容请求相关的其他内容上下文。其他相关字段也应填写。例如，如果内容请求是针对图像内容，则还应使用setContentType（）设置内容类型。内容上下文允许保留无法通过Qt Location API直接访问的其他上下文。

trans-unit.source: The content is stored as a QPlaceContent::Collection which contains both the index of the content, as well as the content itself. This enables developers to check whether a particular item has already been retrieved and if not, then request that content.

trans-unit.source: The content of the image is 44 pixels wide by 32 pixels high. Every 9-patch image needs a one pixel thick line (collectively referred to as "9-patch lines") around every side, so the actual size of the image becomes 46 pixels wide by 34 pixels high. Note that the 9-patch lines must be one pixel thick regardless of the target DPI of the image. For example, the 9-patch lines for button-background.9.png and button-background@2x.9.png must both be one pixel thick.
trans-unit.target: 图像的内容是44像素宽,32像素高。每张9-patch图像的每一面都需要一条1像素厚的线(统称为 "9-patch线"),所以图像的实际尺寸变成了46像素宽,34像素高。需要注意的是,无论图像的目标DPI是多少,9条贴片线都必须是一个像素的厚度。例如,button-background.9.png和button-background@2x.9.png的9条补丁线都必须是一个像素厚。

trans-unit.source: The convenience views (QListWidget, QTableWidget, and QTreeWidget) override the default drag and drop functionality to provide less flexible, but more natural behavior that is appropriate for many applications. For example, since it is more common to drop data into cells in a QTableWidget, replacing the existing contents with the data being transferred, the underlying model will set the data of the target items rather than insert new rows and columns into the model. For more information on drag and drop in convenience views, you can see Using drag and drop with item views.
trans-unit.target: 便利视图（QListWidget，QTableWidget和QTreeWidget）覆盖了默认的拖放功能，以提供较不灵活但更自然的行为，适用于许多应用程序。例如，由于更常见的是将数据放入QTableWidget的单元格中，将现有内容替换为要传输的数据，因此基础模型将设置目标项目的数据，而不是在模型中插入新的行和列。有关在便利视图中拖放的更多信息，请参见在项目视图中使用拖放。

trans-unit.source: The convenience views (QListWidget, QTableWidget, and QTreeWidget) override the default drag and drop functionality to provide less flexible, but more natural behavior that is appropriate for many applications. For example, since it is more common to drop data into cells in a QTableWidget, replacing the existing contents with the data being transferred, the underlying model will set the data of the target items rather than insert new rows and columns into the model. For more information on drag and drop in convenience views, you can see Using drag and drop with item views.

The conversion algorithm will try to find the shortest accurate representation for the given number. "Accurate" means that you get the exact same number back from an inverse conversion on the generated string representation.

trans-unit.target: 结果中返回的坐标数据可能不同于

trans-unit.source: The coordinate mode of the resulting gradient is QGradient::ObjectMode, allowing the preset to be applied to arbitrary object sizes.
trans-unit.target: 生成的渐变的坐标模式为QGradient :: ObjectMode，从而允许将预设应用于任意对象大小。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate space that an application uses in Device Independent Pixels.
The coordinate space the application uses (Device Independent Pixels).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用的坐标空间(设备独立像素)。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate system is controlled by the QPainter class. Together with the QPaintDevice and QPaintEngine classes, QPainter form the basis of Qt's painting system, Arthur. QPainter is used to perform drawing operations, QPaintDevice is an abstraction of a two-dimensional space that can be painted on using a QPainter, and QPaintEngine provides the interface that the painter uses to draw onto different types of devices.
trans-unit.target: 坐标系由QPainter类控制。QPainter与QPaintDevice和QPaintEngine类一起构成了Qt绘画系统Arthur的基础。QPainter用于执行绘制操作，QPaintDevice是可以使用QPainter绘制的二维空间的抽象，并且QPaintEngine提供了绘制器用来在不同类型的设备上绘制的接口。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate values should be specified using the WGS84 datum. For more information on geographical terms see this article on coordinates and another on geodetic systems including WGS84.
trans-unit.target: 坐标值应使用WGS84基准指定。有关地理术语的更多信息，请参见本文中有关坐标的文章以及有关大地测量系统（包括WGS84）的另一篇文章。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate where the icon is going to be shown. What pixel of the icon matches the coordinate is somehow backend-dependent. For example, due to limitations, some backends might associate the center of the icon with the coordinate, others one of the corners. If there is a choice, backend developers should use the center of the icon as the default anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 要显示图标的坐标。图标的哪个像素与坐标相匹配在某种程度上取决于后台。例如,由于限制,一些后台可能会将图标的中心点与坐标相关联,而另一些后台可能会将图标的某个角与坐标相关联。如果有选择,后台开发者应该使用图标的中心作为默认的锚点。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are normalized to the size of the touch device, i.e. (0,0) is the top-left corner and (1,1) is the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 坐标根据触摸设备的大小进行归一化处理,即(0,0)为左上角,(1,1)为右下角。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative frame coordinates: QPointF(0,0) points to the left top frame point, QPointF(0.5,0.5) points to the frame center, which is typically the default spot metering point.
trans-unit.target: 坐标是相对的帧坐标：QPointF（0,0）指向左上框架点，QPointF（0.5,0.5）指向框架中心，通常是默认的点测光点。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative to the MouseArea.
trans-unit.target: 坐标是相对于MouseArea的。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are transformed using the following formulas:
trans-unit.target: 坐标使用以下公式进行变换。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates for the user input that should be processed by the scene as a graph position query. If this property is set to value other than invalidSelectionPoint, the graph tries to match a graph position to the given point within the primary viewport. After the rendering pass, this property is returned to its default state of invalidSelectionPoint. The queried graph position can be read from the AbstractGraph3D::queriedGraphPosition property after the next render pass.
trans-unit.target: 应该由场景处理为图形位置查询的用户输入的坐标。如果将此属性设置为invalidSelectionPoint之外的值，则图形将尝试将图形位置与主视口中的给定点进行匹配。渲染通过后，此属性返回其默认状态invalidSelectionPoint。下一个渲染过程之后，可以从AbstractGraph3D :: queriedGraphPosition属性读取查询的图形位置。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates for the user input that should be processed by the scene as a selection. If this property is set to a value other than invalidSelectionPoint, the graph tries to select a data item at the given point within the primary viewport. After the rendering pass, the property is returned to its default state of invalidSelectionPoint.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的坐标，场景应将其作为选择进行处理。如果将此属性设置为invalidSelectionPoint之外的其他值，则图形将尝试在主视口中的给定点选择数据项。渲染通过后，该属性返回其默认状态invalidSelectionPoint。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates in
trans-unit.target: 坐标在

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the four corners of the georectangle can be accessed with the topLeft, topRight, bottomLeft and bottomRight attributes. The center attribute can be used to get the coordinate of the center of the georectangle. The width and height attributes can be used to get the width and height of the georectangle in degrees. Setting one of these attributes will cause the other attributes to be adjusted accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用topLeft，topRight，bottomLeft和bottomRight属性访问 georectangle 四个角的坐标。该中心的属性可以用来获得的中央位置的坐标 georectangle 。的宽度和高度属性可以用于获取的宽度和高度 georectangle 度。设置这些属性之一将导致相应地调整其他属性。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the waypoints for the desired route. The waypoints should be given in order from origin to destination. Two or more coordinates are needed.
trans-unit.target: 所需路线的航点坐标。航点应按从起点到目的地的顺序排列。需要两个或多个坐标。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates should be listed in the order in which they would be traversed by someone traveling along this segment of the route.
trans-unit.target: 坐标应按沿本段路线行驶的人穿越的顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates system is the same as for custom focus points: QPointF(0,0) points to the left top frame point, QPointF(0.5,0.5) points to the frame center.
trans-unit.target: 坐标系与自定义焦点相同：QPointF（0,0）指向左上框架点，QPointF（0.5,0.5）指向框架中心。

trans-unit.source: The coordination of network operations is performed by the QNetworkAccessManager class. Once a request has been created, this class is used to dispatch it and emit signals to report on its progress. The manager also coordinates the use of cookies to store data on the client, authentication requests, and the use of proxies.
trans-unit.target: 网络操作的协调由QNetworkAccessManager类执行。创建请求后，将使用此类来分派请求并发出信号以报告其进度。管理器还协调使用Cookie来存储客户端上的数据，身份验证请求以及代理的使用。

trans-unit.source: The core Qt Gui library by default supports reading and writing image files of the most common file formats: PNG, JPEG, BMP, GIF and a few more, ref. Reading and Writing Image Files. The Qt Image Formats add-on module provides optional support for other image file formats.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，核心Qt Gui库支持读取和写入最常见文件格式的图像文件： PNG ， JPEG ， BMP ， GIF 和其他一些格式，参考。读写图像文件。“ Qt图像格式”附加模块为其他图像文件格式提供可选支持。

trans-unit.source: The core Vulkan commands are exposed via the QVulkanFunctions object, retrievable by calling QVulkanInstance::functions(). Device level functions are available after creating a VkDevice by calling QVulkanInstance::deviceFunctions().
trans-unit.target: 核心Vulkan命令通过QVulkanFunctions对象公开，可通过调用QVulkanInstance :: functions（）进行检索。通过调用QVulkanInstance :: deviceFunctions（）创建VkDevice之后，可以使用设备级功能。

trans-unit.source: The core functionality of QPainter is drawing, but the class also provide several functions that allows you to customize QPainter's settings and its rendering quality, and others that enable clipping. In addition you can control how different shapes are merged together by specifying the painter's composition mode.
trans-unit.target: QPainter的核心功能是绘图，但是该类还提供了几个功能，可让您自定义QPainter的设置及其呈现质量，以及其他一些允许剪切的功能。另外，您可以通过指定画家的构图模式来控制如何将不同的形状合并在一起。

trans-unit.source: The core functionality of QPainter is drawing, but the class also provide several functions that allows you to customize QPainter's settings and its rendering quality, and others that enable clipping. In addition you can control how different shapes are merged together by specifying the painter's composition mode.

The core help engine can be used to perform different tasks. By calling documentsForIdentifier() the engine returns URLs specifying the file locations inside the help system. The actual file data can then be retrived by calling fileData().

The core help engine can be used to perform different tasks. By calling linksForIdentifier() the engine returns URLs specifying the file locations inside the help system. The actual file data can then be retrived by calling fileData(). In contrast to all other functions in this class, linksForIdentifier() depends on the currently set custom filter. Depending on the filter, the function may return different results.
trans-unit.target: 核心帮助引擎可用于执行不同的任务。通过调用linksForIdentifier（），引擎返回指定帮助系统内文件位置的URL。然后可以通过调用fileData（）检索实际的文件数据。与此类中的所有其他函数相比，linksForIdentifier（）取决于当前设置的自定义过滤器。取决于过滤器，该函数可能返回不同的结果。

trans-unit.source: The core properties of a video stream required to setup a video surface are the pixel format given by pixelFormat(), and the frame dimensions given by frameSize().
trans-unit.target: 设置视频表面所需的视频流的核心属性是pixelFormat（）给出的像素格式，以及frameSize（）给出的帧尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding source file looks as follows:
trans-unit.target: 相应的源文件如下。

trans-unit.source: The cost strategy to use to cache decompressed map tiles in memory. Valid values are bytesize and unitary. Using bytesize, the related size parameter (esri.mapping.cache.texture.size) will be interpreted as bytes. Using unitary, they will be interpreted as number of tiles. The default value for this parameter is bytesize.
trans-unit.target: 用于在内存中缓存解压缩的地图切片的成本策略。有效值为bytesize和unitary。使用bytesize，相关的size参数（esri.mapping.cache.texture.size）将被解释为字节。使用unitary，它们将被解释为图块数。此参数的默认值为bytesize。

trans-unit.source: The cost strategy to use to cache decompressed map tiles in memory. Valid values are bytesize and unitary. Using bytesize, the related size parameter (here.mapping.cache.texture.size) will be interpreted as bytes. Using unitary, they will be interpreted as number of tiles. The default value for this parameter is bytesize.

trans-unit.source: The created TimeStamp is normalized, i.e. microseconds greater 1000000 are converted to seconds.
trans-unit.target: 将创建的时间戳标准化，即将大于1000000的微秒转换为秒。

trans-unit.source: The created object and its creation status are available via the
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象及其创建状态可通过

trans-unit.source: The creation context of a Component corresponds to the context where the Component was declared. This context is used as the parent context (creating a context hierarchy) when the component is instantiated by an object such as a ListView or a Loader.
trans-unit.target: 组件的创建上下文与声明该组件的上下文相对应。当组件通过ListView或Loader之类的对象实例化时，此上下文用作父上下文（创建上下文层次结构）。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform Qt Network module provides classes that make local network programming portable and easy. It offers the QLocalServer and QLocalSocket classes that allow for network-like communication in a local setup. Their TCP counterparts can be used as drop-in replacement to make the communication work across networks.

The cross-platform Qt Network module provides classes that make network programming portable and easy. It offers high-level classes (e.g. QNetworkAccessManager) that communicate using specific application-level protocols, and lower-level classes (e.g., QTcpSocket, QTcpServer, QSslSocket) for implementing protocols.

The cross-platform Qt Network module provides classes that make network programming portable and easy. It offers high-level classes (e.g., QNetworkAccessManager, QFtp) that communicate using specific application-level protocols, and lower-level classes (e.g., QTcpSocket, QTcpServer, QSslSocket) for implementing protocols.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台的Qt网络模块提供了使网络编程可移植且容易的类。它提供了使用特定的应用程序级协议进行通信的高层类（例如QNetworkAccessManager，QFtp），以及提供了用于实现协议的较低层的类（例如QTcpSocket，QTcpServer，QSslSocket）。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform class QProcess can be used to start external programs as child processes, and to communicate with them. It provides an API for monitoring and controlling the state of the child process. QProcess gives access to the input/output channels of child process by inheriting from QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台类QProcess可用于将外部程序作为子进程启动，并与它们进行通信。它提供了一个用于监视和控制子进程状态的API。QProcess通过继承QIODevice来访问子进程的输入/输出通道。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform shared memory class, QSharedMemory, provides access to the operating system's shared memory implementation. It allows safe access to shared memory segments by multiple threads and processes. Additionally, QSystemSemaphore can be used to control access to resources shared by the system, as well as to communicate between processes.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台共享内存类QSharedMemory提供对操作系统的共享内存实现的访问。它允许通过多个线程和进程安全地访问共享内存段。此外，QSystemSemaphore可用于控制对系统共享资源的访问，以及在进程之间进行通信。
